name: The Forever Platformer
description:
Jump!

               Jump,

Jump,

An infinite runner, where you have to jump over nasty obstacles.

If you don't jump, you're going to die.

NOTE FROM DEVELOPER: This game was actually first created on my old Scratch account (I had two at the time, D_OrangeGAMING and HelloHiByeBye1). You can play the original here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/115448083/
